alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Grand County through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Canyonlands National Park, or 18 miles west of Moab, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Grand County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 163 and 182. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 151 and 157. Utah 313 between mile markers 7 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges
